body_html: How about “project coaches” since we often refer to the mentors as “project mentors” (because there's often this confusion between mentors and coaches)? It's kind of an easy way out in a way, I know... but at least we'd have a very straight-forward name :D

body: How about “project coaches” since we often refer to the mentors as “project mentors” (because there's often this confusion between mentors and coaches)? It's kind of an easy way out in a way, I know... but at least we'd have a very straight-forward name :D
